tags.Name: Incorporeal
tags.Description: Attacks against me become direct attacks.

tags.Name: Quick
tags.Description: I can attack or $relocate the turn I was $deployed.

tags.Name: Swift
tags.Description: I can attack AND $relocate in the same turn.

tags.Name: Swapper
tags.Description: I can swap places with friendly $units on relocation.

tags.Name: Piercing
tags.Description: In combat, the difference between me and a weaker enemy creature is dealt as direct-damage.
